Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state D, $P_D = P_1$ and $V_D = V_2$
Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state A, $P_A = P_1$ and $V_A = V_1$
From D to A, the volume of the process decreases, and the work done by the outside world on the gas: $W_{DA} = p_1 \left(V_2 - V_1\right)$
